verses.text: Would you win a Saviour's blessing? Freely, freely give; Work you see in work preparing; Freely, freely give; Like the dew on balm distilling, Freely, freely give; Love to want for souls that famish, Freely, freely give.

With a cheerful heart and willing, Freely, freely give; Use the talent He has given, Freely, freely give; Have you riches? Give you only; O how precious is to sight! Is your offering still be-quired; Freely, freely give.
Would you drink of Christ's salvation? Freely, freely give; In the harvest of the Lord? There ye who find rest; Freely, freely give.

chorus.text: Freely, freely give, Freely, freely give, Freely, freely give, Freely, freely give.
